item.title: CVE-2024-37474|2024-07-08T17:21:11.636Z -- automattic -- newspack%20ads
item.description: Cross Site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Automattic Newspack Ads allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Newspack Ads: from n/a through 1.47.1.
